alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 02 at 2:10PM MDT until May 03 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Treasure Valley south and east of Boise, Western Magic Valley and Southern Twin Falls County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Tuesday. Winds will decrease after 10 PM MDT tonight, then increase again Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow unsecured objects around. Difficult driving conditions for high profile vehicles. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. &&

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
